wandascribe-panel-title: Title of the WandaScribe assistance panel
wandascribe-improve-text: Button text for improving text quality
wandascribe-make-formal: Button text for making text more formal
wandascribe-make-casual: Button text for making text more casual
wandascribe-expand: Button text for expanding text with more details
wandascribe-loading: Loading message shown when AI is processing
wandascribe-no-text-selected: Message shown when no text is selected
wandascribe-apply: Button text for applying a suggestion
wandascribe-dismiss: Button text for dismissing a suggestion
wandascribe-powered-by-wanda: Attribution text showing the extension is powered by Wanda
wandascribe-select-text-hint: Hint message to select text for assistance
wandascribe-wanda-not-available: Error message when Wanda extension is not available
wandascribe-no-spelling-errors: Success message shown when no spelling errors are found
wandascribe-no-changes-needed: Message shown when the text doesn't need any changes
